DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics profile drug-drug interaction amlodipine , olmesartan rosuvastatin healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Drug Interaction Study Between Amlodipine , Olmesartan Rosuvastatin Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 19 55 year A body mass index range 19 27 kg/m2 Willingness participate entire study period Written inform consent fully inform study procedures Any past medical history hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , respiratory , endocrine , psychiatric , neurologic , haematooncologic cardiovascular disease History clinically significant drug hypersensitivity Use medication within 7 day first dose Heavy drinker ( > 140 g/week ) Whole blood donation 60 day study Judged eligible study participation investigator
